items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by any user, all other users see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System should support at least 500 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Updates should have a latency of less than 2 seconds.

items.title: Shared Project Boards
items.description: Allow multiple users to view and manage tasks within shared boards.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a project board and invite other registered users.
Invited users can add, edit, and delete tasks on the shared board according to permissions.
non_functional: Board loading time should be under 3 seconds.
System should handle at least 100 active boards simultaneously.

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed core collaboration features include real-time updates and shared boards. Additional features like chat or file sharing may be considered in future iterations.
